name: The computer broke. Land it yourself!
name_original: The computer broke. Land it yourself!
description: This game is extra difficult because rotation of the lander behaves based on the laws of physics.  Your goal is to successfully land to get to the next level.  To make it easier or even possible to succeed, a history is constantly recorded to allow you to go back in time and change the lander thrust settings.  The history is also a cool feature that enables you to play back your successful landing.
